物理调节肿瘤微环境以增强癌症治疗宣布在《BIO Integration》杂志上发表一篇新文章。肿瘤微环境（TME）在肿瘤的发生、转移和复发中起着至关重要的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Physical-modulation-of-the-tumor-microenvironment-to-enhance-cancer-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Physical-modulation-of-the-tumor-microenvironment-to-enhance-cancer-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f82201f8-c489-4d3f-8741-9c7a2dd9a312 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 13:04:14 -0400 Physical modulation of the tumor microenvironment to enhance cancer therapy
药剂师和社区卫生工作者领导成功的高血压干预措施杜兰大学的一项新研究发现，在帮助高血压患者控制高血压方面，药剂师和社区卫生工作者的成功率最高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Pharmacists-and-community-health-workers-lead-successful-hypertension-interventions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Pharmacists-and-community-health-workers-lead-successful-hypertension-interventions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d634a734-02f1-4675-bc53-bba6200a400a Fri, 19 Jul 2024 12:47:05 -0400 Pharmacists and community health workers lead successful hypertension interventions
研究揭示了开发通用流感疫苗的一种有前途的方法俄勒冈健康与科学大学领导的新研究揭示了开发通用流感疫苗的一种有前途的方法：一种所谓的“一劳永逸”的疫苗，可赋予对不断进化的病毒的终生免疫力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Study-reveals-a-promising-approach-to-developmenting-universal-influenza-vaccine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Study-reveals-a-promising-approach-to-developmenting-universal-influenza-vaccine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7257879a-6ba6-48b8-a7a9-1cda333ba80e Fri, 19 Jul 2024 12:36:35 -0400 Study reveals a promising approach to developing universal influenza vaccine
在特朗普的共和党大会上，几乎没有听到关于医疗保健的内容没有谈论奥巴马医改。或堕胎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/At-Trumpe28099s-GOP-convention-theree28099s-little-to-be-heard-on-health-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/At-Trumpe28099s-GOP-convention-theree28099s-little-to-be-heard-on-health-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2073936-124d-4389-82aa-1b70a319ad15 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 10:32:38 -0400 At Trump’s GOP convention, there’s little to be heard on health care
诉讼称，误导性广告在未经授权的 ACA 注册计划中发挥着关键作用政府要发钱了！各种社交媒体平台上的广告就是如此。广告声称，消费者每月有资格获得 1,400 美元甚至 6,400 美元，用于支付杂货、租金、医疗费用和其他账单。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Misleading-ads-play-key-role-in-schemes-to-gin-up-unauthorized-ACA-sign-ups-lawsuit-alleges.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Misleading-ads-play-key-role-in-schemes-to-gin-up-unauthorized-ACA-sign-ups-lawsuit-alleges.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5f16132-bf91-4719-a859-9b843bde888a Fri, 19 Jul 2024 07:01:25 -0400 Misleading ads play key role in schemes to gin up unauthorized ACA sign-ups, lawsuit alleges
用于乳腺癌治疗的激素调节疗法是否会影响阿尔茨海默病和相关痴呆症的风险？用于乳腺癌治疗的激素调节疗法 (HMT) 与患阿尔茨海默病和相关痴呆症的风险之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Does-hormone-modulated-therapy-for-breast-cancer-treatment-affect-risk-for-Alzheimer-disease-and-lated-dementias.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Does-hormone-modulated-therapy-for-breast-cancer-treatment-affect-risk-for-Alzheimer-disease-and-lated-dementias.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01444746-3dd5-4b3d-a4c3-946428496385 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 05:14:00 -0400 Does hormone-modulating therapy for breast cancer treatment affect risk for Alzheimer disease and related dementias?
水凝胶植入技术为寻求可逆绝育和子宫内膜异位症治疗的女性带来新希望水凝胶植入物用于可逆性输卵管闭塞，提供避孕作用并预防子宫内膜异位症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Hydrogel-implant-technology-offers-new-hope-for-women-seeking-reversible-sterilization-and-endometriosis-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Hydrogel-implant-technology-offers-new-hope-for-women-seeking-reversible-sterilization-and-endometriosis-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0616697e-a25a-4bd5-a71e-7d82a3ec6692 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 04:48:00 -0400 Hydrogel implant technology offers new hope for women seeking reversible sterilization and endometriosis treatment
精英控制者：他们的基因组是否掌握着治愈艾滋病毒的关键？尽管南非是全球艾滋病毒感染者人数最多的国家，但在控制艾滋病毒流行方面已经取得了长足进步，特别是在减少艾滋病毒发病率、检测和治疗方面。借助华大智造先进的测序工具和技术，南非医学研究委员会 (SAMRC) 和夸祖鲁纳塔尔大学 (UKZN) 的研究人员正在逐步找到自然控制 HIV 感染的答案，从而改善健康结果和南非人的生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Elite-Controllers-Do-their-genomes-hold-the-key-to-curing-HIV.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Elite-Controllers-Do-their-genomes-hold-the-key-to-curing-HIV.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4945e57f-eb78-496a-b475-e241f0f94cf2 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 04:03:00 -0400 Elite Controllers: Do their genomes hold the key to curing HIV?
扩大遗传视野：来自 VA 百万退伍军人计划的 GWAS 见解一项大规模全基因组关联研究 (GWAS) 使用来自美国退伍军人事务部 (VA) 百万退伍军人计划 (MVP)（美国最大的生物库之一）的数据，填补了我们对这些关系的了解中的关键空白一项新的研究表明，不同人群的基因、性状和疾病之间存在差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Expanding-genic-Horizo​​ns-GWAS-insights-from-the-VA-Million-Veterans-Program.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Expanding-genic-Horizo​​ns-GWAS-insights-from-the-VA-Million-Veterans-Program.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69551b27-4cd9-4577-b4f3-59308aa22926 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 01:31:22 -0400 Expanding genetic Horizons: GWAS insights from the VA Million Veterans Program
绘制摩洛哥孕产妇和婴儿健康研究图谱：22 年范围界定审查由麦克马斯特大学研究人员领导的一项全面范围界定审查提供了摩洛哥从 2000 年到 2022 年 22 年期间孕产妇和婴儿健康 (MIH) 研究领域的第一张地图，并提出了研究全球健康的不同方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Mapping-maternal-and-infant-health-research-in-Morocco-A-22-year-scoping-review.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240719/Mapping-maternal-and-infant-health-research-in-Morocco-A-22-year-scoping-review.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4cd0bdd1-a514-4a50-9fc1-3b3f77678dd9 Fri, 19 Jul 2024 01:10:00 -0400
